      public OfertaService()

  • Method Details

    • createOferta

      public void createOferta(Oferta oferta)
      This method is used to create a new Oferta instance. It takes an Oferta instance as a parameter and saves it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      oferta - The Oferta instance to be saved. Instance of Oferta.

    • findByActividadId

      public List<Oferta> findByActividadId(Number id)
      This method is used to find all Oferta instances associated with a specific Actividad. It returns a List of Oferta instances that are associated with the Actividad with the provided id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Actividad whose associated Oferta instances are to be found. Number.
      Returns:
      A List of Oferta instances that are associated with the Actividad with the provided id.

    • save

      public void save(Oferta oferta)
      This method is used to save an Oferta instance to the repository. It takes an Oferta instance as a parameter and saves it to the repository.
      Parameters:
      oferta - The Oferta instance to be saved. Instance of Oferta.

    • findByColegioIdAndActividadId

      public Optional<Oferta> findByColegioIdAndActividadId(Long colegioId, Long actividadId)
      This method is used to find an Oferta instance associated with a specific Colegio and Actividad. It returns an Optional that can contain the Oferta instance if it exists.
      Parameters:
      colegioId - The id of the Colegio whose associated Oferta instance is to be found. Long.
      actividadId - The id of the Actividad whose associated Oferta instance is to be found. Long.
      Returns:
      An Optional that can contain the Oferta instance if it exists.

    • findByColegioId

      public List<Oferta> findByColegioId(Long id)
      This method is used to find all Oferta instances associated with a specific Colegio. It returns a List of Oferta instances that are associated with the Colegio with the provided id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Colegio whose associated Oferta instances are to be found. Long.
      Returns:
      A List of Oferta instances that are associated with the Colegio with the provided id.

    • delete

      public void delete(Oferta oferta)
      This method is used to delete an Oferta instance from the repository. It takes an Oferta instance as a parameter and deletes it from the repository.
      Parameters:
      oferta - The Oferta instance to be deleted. Instance of Oferta.

    • getAllOfertas

      public List<Oferta> getAllOfertas()
      This method is used to retrieve all Oferta instances from the repository. It returns a List of all Oferta instances.
      Returns:
      A List of all Oferta instances.
